item.description:
The Salem Film Fest is on this weekend - does anybody want to join me? I'm planning to see at least one film tonight - Andrew Bird: Fever Year which starts at 7 pm. 

 

If I get a few people we can fit in a Thai dinner also perhaps - there's a nice Thai restaurant next door.

 

Check out the website and book your tickets at this website (sorry if link doesn't work): 

 http://salemfilmfest.com/ ;

 

This is a wonderful festival of documentaries...!  Films all day Sunday and into the following week also. Email me if you are interested as there are quite a few I'd like to see.
item.name: Salem film fest and Thai dinner out?
